title: How to Write a Great Git Commit Message
topic_summary: A practical guide to crafting clear, concise, and reviewable git commit messages that improve code collaboration and project maintainability.
target_audience: Software developers, programmers, and teams using version control systems like Git

scenes.title: Introduction
scenes.narration_summary: Explain what commit messages are and why they matter for code quality and team collaboration

scenes.title: Bad Commit Messages
scenes.narration_summary: Show common examples of poor commit messages and their problems

scenes.title: Good Commit Message Practices
scenes.narration_summary: Demonstrate structure, clarity, and conciseness principles for effective commit messages

scenes.title: Tools and Techniques
scenes.narration_summary: Share practical tips and tools for writing better commit messages consistently

scenes.title: Summary and Recap
scenes.narration_summary: Re-state the key principles for writing great git commit messages
